item.title: List of PostgreSQL® AI Projects and Resources
item.description: Everyone is now talking about AI, and modern databases like PostgreSQL® are increasingly being adopted in companies’ AI journey as sources of data or key pieces of the AI infrastructure. Moreover there’s a new set projects that are solving PostgreSQL problems with AI.
